Description: Cake that includes shredded carrots and often has buttercream icing on the top
Cake that includes cocoa powder to make a chocolatey flavour.
Cake that has vanilla essence in it so as that it has that flavour. This is considered a basic flavour.
A combination of different flavour cake batters, often only 2 or 3 flavours. They are lightly mixed together to create a marble pattern.
Includes lemon curd in the middle of a vanilla and poppy seed cake.
